title: I logged into league and found i had stumbled upon a free 800 rp from riot.
body: Im not complaining but it was a surprise, i would like to know how i got that rp. My IGN is TSW Hazard.

replies.body: I would suggest not spending it. It could be a legit stuff-up, in which case the rp will be taken from your account, and if you brought anything with it, it would also be removed.
